                                         InvalidResponse,
                                         APIError,
                                         RequestFailed,
                                         UnsupportedEncodingException,
                                         org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
        Creates a new Hook
        Parameters:
        trigger - One of the available hook (See: https://veridu.com/wiki/Hook_Resource#Available_Triggers)
        url - Full hook url
        Returns:
        Details of the hook in JSON format
        Throws:
        EmptySession - Exception
        SignatureFailed - Exception
        NonceMismatch - Exception
        EmptyResponse - Exception
        InvalidFormat - Exception
        InvalidResponse - Exception
        APIError - Exception
        RequestFailed - Exception
        UnsupportedEncodingException - Exception
        org.json.simple.parser.ParseException
